items.title: Brokers uneasy with ‘Fit and Proper’ norms, raise concerns with Sebi
items.description: Despite the notification issued in 2021, there are hardly any instances where Sebi has invoked these amended ‘Fit and Proper’ provisions for disqualification of an intermediary.

items.title: Bharti Airtel share price declines 0.66% in Tuesday's trading session
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,896.60, Bharti Airtel has demonstrated recent volatility, in today's session.

items.title: Bajaj Finance Q1 Preview: Double-digit NII, profit growth likely on healthy loan growth
items.description: Bajaj Finance is expected to report double-digit growth in net interest income and profit for Q1FY26, backed by strong loan growth and declining credit costs.

items.title: UltraTech Cement shares fall 2.01% in morning trade
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 12,324, UltraTech Cement reflects a 2.01% decrease in today's session compared to its previous close.

items.title: Indian Railway Finance Corporation shares fall 2.05% on Nifty Next 50
items.description: Moneycontrol analysis indicates very bearish sentiment on the stock as of July 22, 2025.

items.title: PI Industries share price falls 2.04%; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: At 11:08 am, PI Industries is trading at Rs 4,088, reflecting the shift in investor sentiment.

items.title: Real estate stocks fall post-Oberoi Realty’s Q1 results: Godrej Properties, Phoenix, others down up to 2%
items.description: Oberoi Realty on July 21 reported a net profit of Rs 421 crore for the first quarter of the financial year 2026. This marks a nearly 28 percent decline from the Rs 584 crore net profit reported in the corresponding quarter of the previous financial year.

items.title: Bharti Airtel share price falls 1.04% in morning trade
items.description: With the stock currently priced at Rs 1,889.30, Bharti Airtel has seen a slight dip in today's session.

items.title: Latent View shares soar 5 percent after tenth quarter of revenue growth, financial services expands by 50 percent
items.description: The consulting firm has seen a growth of 1.93x since FY22 on strong demand from top customers, with over three-fourth of its revenue coming from clients that have been with the company for more than five years.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares fall nearly a percent on Tuesday
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 3,474.40, Larsen & Toubro is navigating a market influenced by both its financial performance and investor sentiment.

items.title: Paytm, Dalmia Bharat among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: Overall, the Nifty Midcap 150 saw positive movement from One 97 Paytm, Dalmia Bharat, Hitachi Energy, MRPL and United Brewerie in today's session.

items.title: Eicher Motors shares fall over 1.5%; stock among top losers on Nifty 50
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 5,472, Eicher Motors is currently facing bearish sentiment in today's session.

items.title: Hindustan Unilever share price falls marginally in today's session
items.description: Shares of Hindustan Unilever were trading at Rs 2,459.90 in Tuesday's session.

items.description: With the stock's current performance and recent financial disclosures, Eternal is showing significant gains in today's trading session, leading among Nifty 50 gainers.

items.description: The annual revenue for 2025 was Rs 19,282.83 Crore, a decrease from Rs 20,520.98 Crore in 2024
